ISSUE.TITLE: "GetWarehouseByIdAsync" is found in two different services
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: (at least) 4.30 to 4.60 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40871547/188645591-7f0043e4-f234-4a35-9988-ad9c366e9ea3.png) I found these methods that basically do the same thing and both of them are used. I belive the one in IProductService should be removed if there is no particular reason to keep them both.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6301 Use name for specification attribute option as CustomValue when exporting products
